text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Jack Herrick, wikiHow founder interviewed by Wikinews
text.summary: Jack Herrick, founder of the how-to guide website wikiHow, talks to Wikinews about the success of his website, how it differs from his previous venture, eHow, and the reasons why he chose a Creative Commons license for wikiHow, which allows contributors to retain ownership of their content.
